title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the 'Finish' button, the JAR creation fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
OB: The JAR packager reports open files very late.
EB: The JAR packager should report open files immediately and not wait until the 'Finish' button is pressed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open any file in the JAR packager. 
2. Press the 'Finish' button to create the JAR file. 
3. Observe the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
